\newcommand{\otte}{
\ottrulehead{e  ,\ p}{\Coloneqq}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{x}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathbin{< >}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  e}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\lambda^{\forall}  \underline{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  e}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{\{}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{\}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{refl} \, e}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{let} \, x  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{in} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \widehat{x}  [  \sigma  ] }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{\_}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\otteInline}{\ottprodinline{}{e  ,\ p}{\Coloneqq}{{x} \mid {\mathbin{< >}} \mid {\lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  e} \mid {\lambda^{\forall}  \underline{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  e} \mid {e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \mid {e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{\{}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{\}}} \mid {\ottkw{refl} \, e} \mid {\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}} \mid {\ottkw{let} \, x  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{in} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \mid { \widehat{x}  [  \sigma  ] } \mid {\ottkw{\_}}}}

\newcommand{\ottA}{

\ottprodline{|}{ \forall  \underline{x} : A  . \,  B }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  A }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{let} \, x  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{=}  e \, \ottkw{in} \, B}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottAInline}{\ottprodinline{}{A  ,\ B  ,\ C  ,\ D}{\Coloneqq}{{ 1 } \mid { \Pi  \ottmv{x} : A  . \,  B } \mid { \forall  \underline{x} : A  . \,  B } \mid { e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  A } \mid {\ottkw{let} \, x  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{=}  e \, \ottkw{in} \, B}}}

\newcommand{\ottce}{

\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  cE_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  cE_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  cA  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  cB  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  cE  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline

\newcommand{\ottceInline}{\ottprodinline{}{cE  ,\ cP}{\Coloneqq}{{\bullet} \mid {\lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  cA  .\,  e} \mid {\lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  cE} \mid {\lambda^{\forall}  \underline{x}  \ottsym{:}  cA  .\,  e} \mid {\lambda^{\forall}  \underline{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  cE} \mid {cE_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \mid {e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, cE_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \mid {\ottkw{refl} \, cE} \mid {\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  cP  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}} \mid {\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  cE_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}} \mid {\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  cE_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}} \mid {\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  cA  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}} \mid {\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  cB  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}} \mid {\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  cE  \ottsym{)}} \mid {\ottkw{let} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  cE_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{in} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \mid {\ottkw{let} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{in} \, cE_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}}

\newcommand{\ottcA}{
\ottrulehead{cA  ,\ cB}{\Coloneqq}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \Pi  \ottmv{x} : cA  . \,  B }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \Pi  \ottmv{x} : A  . \,  cB }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \forall  \underline{x} : cA  . \,  B }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \forall  \underline{x} : A  . \,  cB }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ cE_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  A }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  cE_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  A }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  cA }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottcAInline}{\ottprodinline{}{cA  ,\ cB}{\Coloneqq}{{ \Pi  \ottmv{x} : cA  . \,  B } \mid { \Pi  \ottmv{x} : A  . \,  cB } \mid { \forall  \underline{x} : cA  . \,  B } \mid { \forall  \underline{x} : A  . \,  cB } \mid { cE_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  A } \mid { e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  cE_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  A } \mid { e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  cA }}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvVarName}[0]{ConvConvVar}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvVarLabel}[0]{ConvConvVar}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvVar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  \equiv  \ottmv{x}}{%
{\ottdruleConvConvVarName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvVarLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleConvConvVar{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleConvConvVarName}{#1\ottdruleConvConvVarLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvAVarName}[0]{ConvConvAVar}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvAVarLabel}[0]{ConvConvAVar}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvAVar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\sigma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  \sigma_{{\mathrm{2}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash   \widehat{x}  [  \sigma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  ]   \equiv   \widehat{x}  [  \sigma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  ] }{%
{\ottdruleConvConvAVarName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvAVarLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleConvConvAVar{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleConvConvAVarName}{#1\ottdruleConvConvAVarLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvUnitName}[0]{ConvConvUnit}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvUnitLabel}[0]{ConvConvUnit}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvUnit}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  \mathbin{< >}  \equiv  \mathbin{< >}}{%
{\ottdruleConvConvUnitName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvUnitLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleConvConvUnit{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleConvConvUnitName}{#1\ottdruleConvConvUnitLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvLamName}[0]{ConvConvLam}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvLamLabel}[0]{ConvConvLam}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvLam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{Γ;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  A_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  A_{{\mathrm{2}}} \quad \Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  \lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A_{{\mathrm{1}}}  .\,  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  \lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A_{{\mathrm{2}}}  .\,  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{%
{\ottdruleConvConvLamName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvLamLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleConvConvLam{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleConvConvLamName}{#1\ottdruleConvConvLamLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvPLamName}[0]{ConvConvPLam}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvPLamLabel}[0]{ConvConvPLam}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvPLam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{Γ;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  A_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  A_{{\mathrm{2}}} \quad \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \underline{x}  \ottsym{:}  A_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  \lambda^{\forall}  \underline{x}  \ottsym{:}  A_{{\mathrm{1}}}  .\,  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  \lambda^{\forall}  \underline{x}  \ottsym{:}  A_{{\mathrm{2}}}  .\,  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{%
{\ottdruleConvConvPLamName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvPLamLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleConvConvPLam{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleConvConvPLamName}{#1\ottdruleConvConvPLamLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvAppName}[0]{ConvConvApp}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvAppLabel}[0]{ConvConvApp}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvApp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \quad \Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  p_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  p_{{\mathrm{2}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, p_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, p_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{%
{\ottdruleConvConvAppName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvAppLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleConvConvApp{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleConvConvAppName}{#1\ottdruleConvConvAppLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvPAppName}[0]{ConvConvPApp}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvPAppLabel}[0]{ConvConvPApp}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvPApp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \quad \Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  p_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  p_{{\mathrm{2}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{\{}  p_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{\}}  \equiv  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{\{}  p_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{\}}}{%
{\ottdruleConvConvPAppName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvPAppLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleConvConvPApp{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleConvConvPAppName}{#1\ottdruleConvConvPAppLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvReflName}[0]{ConvConvRefl}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvReflLabel}[0]{ConvConvRefl}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvRefl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  \ottkw{refl} \, e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  \ottkw{refl} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{%
{\ottdruleConvConvReflName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvReflLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleConvConvRefl{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleConvConvReflName}{#1\ottdruleConvConvReflLabel}
}

\newcommand{\ottdefnHeaderConvConv}[0]{$\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}$}

\newcommand{\ottdefnConvConv}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{\ottdefnHeaderConvConv}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleConvConvVar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleConvConvAVar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleConvConvUnit{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleConvConvLam{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleConvConvPLam{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleConvConvApp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleConvConvPApp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleConvConvRefl{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

\end{ottdefnblock}}

}{

{\ottdruleRedRedLamAName}{}%
}}

}{

\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKAppNoS}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

\ottpremise{V  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{OK} \quad V  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{OK}}%
}{

\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKSubstNoS}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{V  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{OK} \quad V  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{OK} \quad V  \vdash  p \, \ottkw{OK} \quad V  \vdash  e \, \ottkw{OK}}%
\ottpremise{V  \vdash  A \, \ottkw{OK} \quad V  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \vdash  B \, \ottkw{OK}}%
\ottpremise{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{,}  p  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{,}  A  \ottsym{,}  B \, \ottkw{are} \, \ottkw{ground}}%
}{
V  \vdash  \ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)} \, \ottkw{OK}}{%
{\ottdruleOkOKSubstNoSName}{}%
}}

  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleOkOKSubstNoSName}{#1\ottdruleOkOKSubstNoSLabel}
}

\ottpremise{V  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{OK} \quad V  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{OK} \quad V  \vdash  p \, \ottkw{OK} \quad V  \vdash  e \, \ottkw{OK}}%
\ottpremise{V  \vdash  A \, \ottkw{OK} \quad V  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \vdash  B \, \ottkw{OK}}%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)} \, \ottkw{INERT}}%
}{
V  \vdash  \ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)} \, \ottkw{OK}}{%
